description: Adaptive Layout definition for the Drawer component.

anchor.brief: Side that this drawer is anchored to
anchor.description: This property describes which side of the page, the drawer should be anchored to. It may be one of 'bottom', 'top', 'left' or 'right'.
anchor.label: Anchor

open.description: Specifies whether this Drawer component is open.
open.label: Open

variant.description: This property describes whether the drawer should be anchored temporary, persistent or permanent. If temporary, the drawer will be dismissed when the user unblocks its focus. If persistent, the drawer will be displayed until the user manually closes it. If permanent, the drawer will always remain open.
variant.label: Variant

contains.description: This declares a list of items to be rendered inside the Drawer.
contains.label: Contains
